circle.description: Whether the button is round or not

ghost.description: Whether it's a ghost button or not

icon.description: The icon displayed on the left side of the button is received as an Icon component
icon.description_zh: 按钮左侧展示的图标，接收为Icon组件

loading.description: Whether the loading status is in place

native-type.description: Corresponds to the button's native type attribute
native-type.description_zh: 对应按钮原生 type 属性

plain.description: Whether it is a plain button

:reset-time.description: Set the button to disable the time to prevent duplicate submissions, in milliseconds
:reset-time.description_zh: 设置按钮禁用时间，防止重复提交，单位毫秒

round.description: Whether or not to round the corner buttons

text.description: The text displayed by the button

type.type: primary / success / warning / danger / info / text
type.description: Display buttons have different statuses, and if you set it to text, it will be displayed as a text button
type.description_zh: 展示按钮不同的状态，设置为text则展示为文本按钮

events.name: click
events.description: A callback function that is triggered when a button is clicked
events.description_zh: 当按钮被点击时触发的回调函数

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slots, custom buttons to display content
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽，自定义按钮展示内容
